name: Jast Press UwU
description:
Jast Press UwU (JPU) is a game with an unusual plot in which you have to face the Giferius virus and help him get out into the real world. The game consists of two chapters:

  • The first chapter is a series of puzzles that you have to solve. Some of them will be difficult, so you can help each other in solving them.
  • The second chapter is a platform game with elements of puzzle and battles with enemies. It is in this chapter that almost the entire plot of this game is revealed. 

The game itself is a continuation of my story series of games "- The Last Bit -"

I don't know why, but I wanted to make my game with 1:1 aspect ratio... :D

The game was made by a Russian developer, but the game was also translated into English. In those places where there will be Russian words, you can turn on subtitles or use a translator! :3

 You can report all the bugs in the game in the chat below, I will read them with pleasure and try to fix them. ^-^

If you want to support me financially, you can donate to my DonationAlerts - https://www.donationalerts.com/r/tiradox

My group Discord (RU) - https://discord.gg/KTfzw5Gfa5

My YouTube channel (RU - EN) - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbYkR0et7I808CeVeqzCUmA

I have many more great ideas for you! Happy gaming and bye!
